Description: This template helps in creating the Atlas data lake pipeline in the specified project.

ProjectId.Description: The unique ID for the project to create a data lake pipeline.

Name.Description: Name of the Atlas Data Lake Pipeline.

FieldName.Description: Identifies the field name used to partition data.

Order.Description: Sequence in which MongoDB Atlas slices the collection data to create partitions. The resource expresses this sequence starting with zero.

ClusterName.Description: Human-readable name that identifies the cluster.

CollectionName.Description: Human-readable name that identifies the collection.

DatabaseName.Description: Human-readable name that identifies the database.

Type.Description: Type of transformation applied during the export of the namespace in a Data Lake Pipeline.
